about_the_game:
Get ready to get lost in the darkness in different dimensions to find your missing wife.

This game will give you fear, tension and most of all it will give you Purge.

The Purge is a survival-horror & thriller game with a first-person perspective that has a rich universe and a deep story. There is a dark road ahead of you. You can try to escape, you can hide, or you can fight against dark and terrifying creatures and kill them. But don't forget! Sometimes you can't fight everything and you have to hide.

At the request of his wife, Cristina, Colsen plans a mountain climb, which is their favorite hobby. But things don't go the way they want them to. Colsen, who embarks on an adventure to search for his missing wife, has no idea what is to come. Join Colsen in this dark story, find the pieces hidden in the dimensions behind the doors and solve the mystery behind the story. Of course, it will not be so easy. Listen to the people you will meet on the road and most importantly, DO NOT TRUST ANYONE!

Key Features:

Rich and Deep Story

Meet new people and hear the story history from them, investigate the unseen part of the iceberg, find the mystery underneath the story and learn the purpose of your Arch-enemy. Remember, there's a secret underneath everyone, but what was their darkest secret that they were hiding?

Different Dimensions

Every door you pass brings you closer to the answer, Explore the dark dimensions behind the doors. Be careful, each dimension contains different threats for you, discover their weaknesses. And remember, nothing is as innocent as it seems.

Weapons

Don't like hiding? Then show them! Improve your skills with different weapons, do not forget to do your bullet management well. Be careful, it may not work for everything!

Melee Combat

your bullet is over and you don't want to hide? Then take the stick in your hand! Be careful, it may not give the same effect as a gun, but it will stunn them well.

Stunning Visuals

Get ready for impressive visuals created with the power of Unreal Engine 5! Experience realism as you move between dimensions.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains psychological horror, fear, blood, brutality, killing, wounding, swearing in some characters and negative content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600x or Intel Core i5-7600k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: at least 6GB of VRAM

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700x or Intel Core i7-9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: at least 8GB of VRAM
